lead_paragraph: Nigerian troops also discovered numerous corpses in a riverbed, pointing to a mass killing by the terrorist group.

headline.print_headline: Hundreds of Captives Rescued, Nigeria Says
headline.main: Nigeria Says It Rescued Hundreds From Suspected Boko Haram Territory

snippet: Nigerian troops also discovered numerous corpses in a riverbed, pointing to a mass killing by the terrorist group.
abstract: Nigerian Army claims in Twitter post to have rescued 200 girls and 93 women abducted by Boko Haram, but gives few details; says schoolgirls taken from Chibok over year ago are not among those rescued; many in Nigeria are skeptical of claim as government has been known to make false claims in regard to Boko Haram kidnappings.
